embeds.title: Daisy (Fiche)
embeds.description:
Résumé : Daisy
Original character with highly versatile and distinct playstyles per weapon. Sword & Shield features a free-to-use Dombie Riding transformation for sustained combat; Book deploys Shocking Street Lamps for passive Lightning damage and team Crit buffs; Magic Wand leverages Windseed and Stun for Crit-heavy burst combos.
